tips_text: The dog has a wagging tail.
Ouch!A nail is in my toe.
A kite is flying in the sky.
A core of an apple is hard to eat.
An antenna is on top of the roof.
a golf ball is on the green.
We have a loaf of bread.
Ha, ha, ha! I can’t stop laughing.
A chimp is on the ball.
My kid has a swing set.
A kite is flying in the sky.
Oh!A cheerleader is on my toe!.
Lower your body to avoid the rope.
I am sailing on a yacht.
Make a U-turn as quickly as you can!
The more worms, the more fish.
A house becomes a home with a satellite.
A nun is kneeling in front of a cross.
I have a needle and thread.
I caught a big fish in the net.
